TopicTitle: Discovery Space Program - Dassault Rafale Speed Build + Download

Articles.Content:
Hi all! I have made a new channel called Discovery Space Program! It's purpose is kind of like our real life space agencies channels, but in KSP.

The first video is a speed build of a Dassault Rafale! Download is in the description of the video because Mediafire links were removed from the forums.

Wheels on the wings were slightly facing inwards because they started on the tanks. they have to be aligned or it vers alot like that. All the stuff you added after moving them was unneeded.

Edited February 2, 2016 by Arugela

Hi ! 

I think you can make this a lot better ! That's cool, but to be honest I don't see a big resemblance... Try to have a Rafale picture near to you.

For exemple, you forget the "canards", the little wings on the front... The design is also a bit short, that doesn't help with designing precisely. Try to use Mk2 pieces and the Panther engines. You should also try to hide the struts in the fuselage !

I hope I'm not being rude, but I think you can greatly improve your design by using little tweaks ! I'm not an expert, but I'm french and I think I know how a Rafale replica should look haha.

Have a nice day !

Basically this. Looks more like a dassault mirage without the canards. At least put canards on, It'll make taking off much easier.

However, the rafale is pretty difficult to replicate seeing as the shapes and curves just completely go against KSP parts. I tried it some time ago and came up with this:

Hello to you too!

I actually did have a picture. Maybe I should of shown it in the video...

I actually didn't notice them, they just seemed to blend in. Also, the picture I had was a bit short too. And I don't know how to do the last bit.

Don't worry, you're grand.  Hahaha, lol I'm doing French in secondary school. I not really good though. XD

Thank you very much! Such a nice comment! :]
